mapper.select: SELECT PRO_CATEGORY, COUNT(*) PRO_COUNT FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY PRO_CATEGORY ORDER BY PRO_COUNT DESC

SELECT P.PRO_NO , P.PRO_NAME , P.PRO_PRICE , P.PRO_DCOMPANY , P.PRO_DCOST , P.PRO_QUANTITY , P.PRO_CONDITION , P.PRO_CONTENT , P.USER_ID , P.PRO_FILENAME , P.PRO_CATEGORY , U.USER_NAME FROM PRODUCT P, USERS U WHERE P.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND P.PRO_NO = #{pro_no}
